name: The-Wall-Project
description: - When the user opens the webpage, he has two options: Login and Registration.   - For the first time the user needs to create their own account in order to use the Wall application.  - He registers with this informations: username, fullname, email, password, password confirmation.  	 **Conditions:** 	 - The email and username fields are unique, so only one user with one email 	 - The password and password confirmation fields are identical. 	 - Password needs to be at least 6 characters. 	 - If any of these fails, user sees a proper warning message on the screen.
